<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Eel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=40)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 142</row>

Although these long, narrow fish share similarities in appearance, eels are a diverse group of creatures.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Electric Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=174) (Creature 1), [Giant Moray Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=175) (Creature 5)
name: Eel
